name: Box Jump (Tek Dot Vis) (Tek Dot Vis)
name_original: Box Jump (Tek Dot Vis) (Tek Dot Vis)
description:
Four directions. One destination. Tons of luck. 

This is Box Jump.

The objective? Simple. Just get to the end.

But...it's not so simple...

Enemies are everywhere, platforms always move, and what are these things with question marks on them?

 This is an item box. Through the magic of random number generation, anything can happen when you hit one of them. You could lose time, or gain time. Lose speed, or gain speed. Jump higher, or jump lower.

Download today!

Test your luck and skills in this 2D platformer. For now, it's free, but soon, you might be able to buy a full version on Steam.

Controls

WAD to move.

YOU can help improve the game!

At the end of the game, there's a form where you can tell me what you think of the game. But if you can't beat it, yet still want to give feedback, here's a link to that very form!

https://forms.gle/YAToyNk9AyVggsdw8

This form is also used for sending in bug reports so that I can squash them as fast as I can! No troll responses, pls
